description: lockzz - Portable application from cube one
pre_install: if (-not $env:GITLAB_PAT) { throw 'GITLAB_PAT environment variable not set' }
Write-Host 'Using GitLab authentication (Basic Auth) for download...'
post_install: Write-Host 'lockzz has been installed successfully from cube one GitLab.'
Write-Host 'Run "lockzz" from command line to start the application.'
notes: Portable application from cube one GmbH
Downloaded from private GitLab repository using Basic Auth
Requires GITLAB_PAT environment variable for authentication
No installation required - runs directly from extracted folder
Available as 'lockzz' command in terminal after installation
